DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate effectiveness neuromuscular electrical stimulation ( NMES ) combine closed kinetic chain ( CKC ) exercise patient knee OA .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Muscle Stimulation Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Abstract : Introduction : Osteoarthritis ( OA ) degenerative debilitate change affect synovial joint . Objective : To evaluate effectiveness neuromuscular electrical stimulation ( NMES ) combine closed kinetic chain ( CKC ) exercise patient knee OA . Methods : Nineteen patient knee OA enrol randomize two group : group I treat CKC + NMES , group II treat CKC + NMES placebo . Both group undergo 20 session mini-squat exercise 30 degree knee flexion associate interspersed NMES 5 minute frequency 40 hertz ( Hz ) , 10 minute 70 Hz addition 10 minute 150 Hz , total 25 minute . The data analyze use SPSS ( Statistical Package Social Sciences ) version 17.0 . Data express frequency , mean standard deviation statistically analyze use one-way analysis variance ( ANOVA ) repeat measurement follow Bonferroni 's post-hoc test . The investigator also use unpaired Student 's t-test Kruskal-Wallis Wilcoxon test level significance P < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: patient grade I grade II knee OA ( base KellgrenLawrence classification ; diagnose medical traumatologist ; radiographic change demonstrate reduced joint space least one compartment knee ; subchondral bone sclerosis ; consent participate study patient grade III grade IV knee OA ( base KellgrenLawrence classification ) ; involve another rehabilitation program outside center ; present clinical symptom would prevent participate exercise ; heart disease ; cardiac pacemaker ; periarticular metal implant ; experience change sensitivity ; previous history knee injury ( meniscus , ligament , sprain ) ; uncontrolled diabetes ; neurological disorder cognitive impairment ; rheumatic disease ; history knee trauma last six month ; prior knee surgery ; three consecutive unexcused absence .
